overview: Former professional basketball player Sebastien Bellin looked death in the eye on March 22, 2016 when the second bomb exploded right next to him at Brussels Airport. The photo of the tall Seb on the floor of the departure hall went around the world.  Bellin made it, but his legs were in very bad shape. He begged the doctors to do everything they could to keep them. "If you can do it, one day I'll compete in the Iron Man of Hawaii". It worked and Sebastien kept his word.
title: Rebound
